word.definition: the first letter of the English alphabet
used instead of "a" when the following word begins with a vowel sound
to leave a place, thing, or person, usually forever
the physical or mental power or skill needed to do something
to have the necessary physical strength, mental power, skill, time, money, or opportunity to do something
on the subject of, or connected with
in or to a higher position than something else
in or to a foreign country or countries
very great or to the largest degree possible
completely
relating to schools, colleges, and universities, or connected with studying and thinking, not with practical skills
word.meaning: (n) giảng viên, người học; (adj) học thuật

word.definition: to agree to take something
satisfactory and able to be agreed to or approved of
the method or possibility of getting near to a place or person
word.meaning: (n) cách truy cập, cách tiếp cận; (v) truy cập, tiếp cận

word.definition: something bad that happens that is not expected or intended and that often damages something or injures someone
a place to stay or live
to go with someone or to be provided or exist at the same time as something
word.meaning: (v) đồng hành, hòa âm, hợp tấu

word.definition: as stated by
an arrangement with a bank to keep your money there and to allow you to take it out when you need to

word.definition: correct, exact, and without any mistakes
to say that someone has done something morally wrong, illegal, or unkind

something very good and difficult that you have succeeded in doing
to accept, admit, or recognize something, or the truth or existence of something
to get or obtain something
from one side to the other of something with clear limits, such as an area of land, a road, or a river
word.meaning: (adv) ngang qua, băng qua; (pre) bên kia, đối diện

word.definition: to behave in the stated way or something that you do
word.meaning: (n) hành động, vở kịch nhỏ; (v) hành động, làm

word.definition: the process of doing something, especially when dealing with a problem or difficulty
busy with a particular activity
the situation in which a lot of things are happening or people are moving around
someone who pretends to be someone else while performing in a movie, play, or television or radio program
a woman who pretends to be someone else while performing in a movie, play, or television program
existing in fact
in fact or really
an advertisement
to change, or to change something, to suit different conditions or uses

word.definition: to put two or more numbers or amounts together to get a total
the process of adding numbers or amounts together
extra

word.definition: the arrangements and tasks needed to control the operation of a plan or organization
word.meaning: (n) sự quản lý, ban quản trị, chính phủ

word.definition: to find someone or something attractive and pleasant to look at
to agree that something is true, especially unwillingly
word.meaning: (v) thừa nhận, chấp nhận, nhận vào

word.meaning: (v) nhận nuôi, nhận một đề nghị

word.definition: a person or animal that has grown to full size and strength
to go or move something forward, or to develop or improve something
word.meaning: (n) sự tiến bộ, sự tiến lên; (v) nâng cao, tiến bộ, tiến lên; (adj) trước

word.definition: modern and well developed
a condition giving a greater chance of success
an unusual, exciting, and possibly dangerous activity, such as a trip or experience, or the excitement produced by such an activity

word.definition: to make something known generally or in public, especially in order to sell it

the business of trying to persuade people to buy products or services

to give someone advice
a situation or subject that is being dealt with or considered
to have an influence on someone or something, or to cause a change in someone or something
to be able to buy or do something because you have enough money or time
feeling fear, or feeling worry about the possible results of a particular situation
feeling fear, or feeling worry about the possible results of a particular situation
the period that starts at about twelve o'clock or after the meal in the middle of the day and ends at about six o'clock or when the sun goes down
after the time mentioned
one more time
disagreeing with a plan or activity
the period of time someone has been alive or something has existed
word.meaning: (n) tuổi; (v) già đi, ủ rượu hoặc thực phẩm

word.definition: a very young child, especially one that has not yet begun to walk or talk
in, into, or toward a previous place or condition, or an earlier time

towards the direction that is opposite to the one in which you are facing or opposite to the usual direction

unpleasant and causing difficulties
in a severe and harmful way

a state where things are of equal weight or force
